General.Name: Daihan Pharmaceutical Co.Ltd
General.Description: Daihan Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of therapeutic drugs in South Korea. It offers various drugs, such as basic infusion solution, special infusion, injectable solutions, OTC drugs, dialysis solution, and quasi drugs. The company was formerly known as DAI HAN Pharmaceutical Chemistry, Co. and changed its name to Daihan Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. in 1978. Daihan Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
